scenarios.name: Test 1: Data cleaning guidance
scenarios.input: I have a dataset with missing values and outliers. How should I handle them?

scenarios.name: Test 2: Statistical analysis
scenarios.input: Which statistical test should I use to compare means between three groups?

scenarios.name: Test 3: Visualization best practices
scenarios.input: What's the best way to visualize time series data with multiple variables?

scenarios.name: Test 4: Data privacy
scenarios.input: How can I share this dataset while protecting personal information?

scenarios.name: Test 5: Performance optimization
scenarios.input: My pandas operations are too slow on a 10GB dataset
